module.name: PBX End Point Manager
module.description: PBX End Point Manager supports automated deployment of multiple manufacturers IP telephones.
module.changelog: *2.3.2* Various Bug Fixes *2.3.1* Install directory case corrections *2.3.0* No Changes *2.2.9* Fixed ARI module &amp Update Local Description on Rebuild &amp Fix Firmware Updater *2.2.8* Fixed User & Devices error. *2.2.6* Fixed download progress so that it displays. *2.2.5* Fixed Debug Always on Error &amp File download errors &amp Fix float error on install *2.2.0* Stopped using iframe installer, switched to freepbx version
